name: Sophie Au
bio: I'm a full-stack developer and web designer with a passion for user experience design and agile consulting. When I'm not coding or designing, I can be found exploring Berlin's neighbourhoods and hipster coffee shops.
bioShort: I'm a full-stack developer and web designer with a passion for user experience design and agile consulting. When I'm not coding or designing, I'm exploring Berlin.

name: Jean Bauer
bio: I’m a twenty-three-years-old consultant developer focused on building web solutions for real-life problems, most of the time using JavaScript. I'm currently working for ThoughtWorks.
bioShort: I’m a consultant developer focused on building web solutions for real-life problems, most of the time using JavaScript. I'm currently working for ThoughtWorks.

name: Elloise Przybylo
bio: I'm a technical Business Analyst living in Brisbane, Australia with an Information Technology degree that specialises in the development of web based applications.
bioShort: I'm a technical Business Analyst living in Brisbane, Australia with an Information Technology degree that specialises in the development of web based applications.

name: Jackie Robinson
bio: Hi, I'm Jackie Robinson. I'm a software developer from Slidell, Louisiana. Fun Fact 1: I'm an identical twin. Fun Fact 2: I'm not named after the baseball player. I love Android. I have serious obsession with music. Did I mention I love Android?
bioShort: I'm a software developer from Slidell, Louisiana. Fun Fact: I'm an identical twin. I love Android. I have serious obsession with music. Did I mention I love Android?

name: Kamalashree Nagaraj
bio: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for back-end development, data analytics and agile consulting. When I'm not coding, you can find me, the gardener, the gamer or the artist!
bioShort: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for back-end development, data analytics and agile consulting. When not coding, you can find me, the gardener, the gamer, the artist!

name: Andrei Cartan
bio: I'm a tennis fan with a big passion for trains, lately discovered DevOps which I am very interested in mastering. AWS and Terraform fan and doing AR in iOS as a hobby. Pushing to launch my first mobile app and speak at a conference.
bioShort: Tennis fan with a big passion for trains and DevOps (Terraform and AWS). Doing AR in iOS as a hobby. Pushing to launch my first mobile app and speak at a conference.
